spec_data.Name: erlang-cuttlefish
spec_data.Description:
Cuttlefish is a library for Erlang applications that wish to walk the fine line
between Erlang app.configs and a sysctl-like syntax. The name is a pun on the
pronunciation of 'sysctl' and jokes are better explained.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 07 Aug 2017 12:02:14 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A library for dealing with sysctl-like configuration syntax
